00037 const QString CTooltipManager::textForHyperlink( const QString& link ){
00038   QString moduleName;
00039   QString keyName;
00040     CReferenceManager::Type type;
00041 
00042     CReferenceManager::decodeHyperlink(link, moduleName, keyName, type);
00043   if (moduleName.isEmpty()) {
00044     moduleName = CReferenceManager::preferredModule( type );
00045   }
00046 
00047   qWarning("link was %s, key is %s", link.latin1(), keyName.latin1());
00048   if (moduleName.isEmpty()) {
00049     QString typeName = QString::null;
00050     switch (type) {
00051       case CReferenceManager::Bible:
00052         typeName = i18n("Bible");
00053         break;
00054       case CReferenceManager::Commentary:
00055         typeName = i18n("Commentary");
00056         break;
00057       case CReferenceManager::Lexicon:
00058         typeName = i18n("Lexicon");
00059         break;
00060       case CReferenceManager::GenericBook:
00061         typeName = i18n("Generic Book");
00062         break;
00063         case CReferenceManager::MorphHebrew:
00064         typeName = i18n("Hebrew Morphological lexicon");
00065         break;
00066         case CReferenceManager::MorphGreek:
00067         typeName = i18n("Greek Morphological lexicon");
00068         break;
00069         case CReferenceManager::StrongsHebrew:
00070         typeName = i18n("Hebrew Strong's Lexicon");
00071         break;
00072         case CReferenceManager::StrongsGreek:
00073         typeName = i18n("Greek Strong's Lexicon");
00074         break;
00075         default:
00076         break;
00077     }
00078 
00079     return QString::fromLatin1("<FONT COLOR=\"red\"><CENTER><B>%1</B></CENTER></FONT><HR>%2<BR>%3</FONT>")
00080       .arg(i18n("Configuration problem!"))
00081       .arg(i18n("Please make sure the default module for the type <FONT COLOR=\"blue\"><I>%1</I></FONT> is set properly in the optionsdialog!")
00082           .arg(typeName)
00083       );
00084   };
00085 
00086   if (CSwordModuleInfo* m = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName)) {
00087     CEntryDisplay* display = m ? m->getDisplay() : 0;
00088 #warning "Fix Me!"      
00089    return QString::fromLatin1("<HEAD>%1</HEAD><B>%1</B><HR>%2")
00090       .arg(display ? QString::null /*display->cssHeader(false)*/ : QString::null)
00091       .arg(keyText(m ? m->type() : CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown, keyName)).arg(moduleText(moduleName, keyName));
00092   }
00093   else {
00094     return QString::fromLatin1("<FONT COLOR=\"red\"><CENTER><B>%1</B></CENTER>%2</FONT><HR>")
00095             .arg(i18n("Configuration problem!"))
00096             .arg(i18n("The module <FONT COLOR=\"blue\"><I>%1</I></FONT> was not found on your system! Install the module to make this tooltip working!")
00097               .arg(moduleName)
00098            );
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00103 const QString CTooltipManager::textForReference( const QString& moduleName, const QString& keyName, const QString& description){
00104     CSwordModuleInfo* const module = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName);
00105   CEntryDisplay* display = module ? module->getDisplay() : 0;
00106 #warning "Fix Me"!
00107   return QString::fromLatin1("<HEAD>%1</HEAD><B>%1 %2</B>%3<HR>%4")
00108     .arg(display ? QString::null/*display->cssHeader(false)*/ : QString::null)
00109     .arg(i18n("Bookmark to"))
00110     .arg(keyText(module ? module->type() : CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown, keyName))
00111     .arg(!description.isEmpty() ? QString::fromLatin1("<FONT color=\"#800000\">(%1)</FONT><BR>").arg(description.stripWhiteSpace()) : QString::null )
00112     .arg(moduleText(moduleName, keyName));
00113 }

00115 
00117 const QString CTooltipManager::moduleText( const QString& moduleName, const QString& keyName){
00118   QString text = QString::null;
00119   if (CSwordModuleInfo* module = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName)) {
00120     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(module) );
00121     key->key( keyName );
00122 
00123     backend()->setFilterOptions( CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults() );
00124     text = key->renderedText();
00125 
00126         if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) {
00127       text = QString::null;
00128       ListKey verses = VerseKey().ParseVerseList((const char*)keyName.local8Bit(), "Genesis 1:1", true);
00129             
00130         for (int i = 0; i < verses.Count(); ++i) {
00131             VerseKey* element = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(verses.GetElement(i));
00132             if (element) {
00133                 VerseKey lowerBound = element->LowerBound();
00134           lowerBound.Headings(false);
00135 
00136                     VerseKey upperBound = element->UpperBound();
00137           upperBound.Headings(false);
00138             
00139             while (lowerBound < upperBound) {
00140                 key->key( (const char*)lowerBound );
00141                     text += QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1:%2</B> %3<BR>")
00142               .arg(lowerBound.Chapter())
00143               .arg(lowerBound.Verse())
00144               .arg(key->renderedText());
00145                         lowerBound++;
00146           }
00147           if (lowerBound == upperBound) {
00148                 key->key( (const char*)lowerBound );
00149                     text += QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1:%2</B> %3<BR>")
00150               .arg(lowerBound.Chapter())
00151               .arg(lowerBound.Verse())
00152               .arg(key->renderedText());
00153           }
00154                 }
00155             else {
00156                 key->key( (const char*)(*verses.GetElement(i))  );
00157                     text += key->renderedText();
00158         }
00159         }
00160         }
00161 
00162 
00163     if (module->isUnicode()) {
00164       text = QString::fromLatin1("<DIV %1 STYLE=\"font-family:%2; font-size:%3pt;\">")
00165               .arg(module->textDirection() == CSwordModuleInfo::RightToLeft ? "dir=\"rtl\"" : 0)
00166               .arg(CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode).family())
00167               .arg(CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode).pointSize())
00168              + text + QString::fromLatin1("</DIV>");
00169 //      qWarning(text.latin1());
00170     }
00171     }
00172     return text;
00173 }
00174 
00176 const QString CTooltipManager::keyText( const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType moduleType, const QString& keyName ){
00177     if (moduleType == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || moduleType == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) {
00178      QString text = QString::null;
00179         ListKey keys = VerseKey().ParseVerseList((const char*)keyName.local8Bit(),"Genesis 1:1", true);
00180       if (VerseKey* element = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(keys.GetElement(0)))
00181             return QString::fromLatin1("%1-%2").arg((const char*)element->LowerBound()).arg((const char*)element->UpperBound());
00182       else
00183         return QString::fromLatin1("%1").arg((const char*)(*keys.GetElement(0)));
00184       return text;
00185   }
00186   else { //non-versekeys are not localized
00187         return keyName;
00188   };
00189   return QString::null;
00190 }
